sentences.sentence: Her parents never had a Seder.
sentences.translation: 她的父母从来没有进行过逾越节晚餐。

sentences.sentence: He now co-hosts the daily video show Maron v Seder at mvslive.com.
sentences.translation: 现在他在mvslive.com联合主持每日视频节目“马龙V赛德”。

sentences.sentence: “I know how much goes into preparing for a Seder and entertaining, ” Ms. Herrmann said.
sentences.translation: 赫曼女士说：“我知道准备家宴并宴请大家需要多大的精力。
